title: Show HN: Codex – find and replace with multi lines and Tree-sitter queries
text:
Find & replace has always felt a bit kludgy for anything more than a simple rename or regex.

Here I propose a simple syntax that combines plain text, regexes, and tree-sitter queries, and treats newlines and indentation intuitively.

Implementation: https://gitlab.com/gushogg-blake/edita-release/-/tree/0.18.0...

Ask HN: Does anybody making good money from Google Adsense?
text:
My Google Adsense earning is gradually going down so I want to know is here anybody making a good money from Google Adsense programme. Also, what keywords and niche you're following. It's ok if you don't want to include a link to your website/app or blog.

Thanks in advance.

title: Russian General Disclosed UFOs Are Intelligently Piloted Offworld Craft
Ask HN: What are unusual or surprising jobs around software engineering?
text:
I've been a software engineer (and recently manager) since 20+ years. I've been building products all this time, as an employee or contractor. I wonder what alternatives there are to this very normal way of working.

For example, there is consulting, teaching. I've also been always interested in focusing on very old tech and keeping it running.

I'm happy to read about anything surprising, inspiring in the field of software. Doesn't have to be exciting, just unusual, off the beaten path.
